>Construction of pLYC13
acquire oligo ZH4			
acquire oligo ZH4R
acquire oligo ZH2
acquire oligo ZH2R
acquire oligo ZH6
acquire oligo ZH6R
acquire plasmid pLYC5
acquire plasmid pAtipiTrc
PCR ZH4,ZH2R on pLYC5	(3216 bp, pcrA)
PCR ZH2,ZH6R on pLYC5	(3683 bp, pcrB)
PCR ZH6,ZH4R on pAtipiTrc (1349 bp, pcrC)
Assemble pcrA,pcrB,pcrC	(Gibson, pLYC13)
Transform pLYC13	(Mach1, Amp)
